description: Explore the transformative impact of blockchain technology in the real estate industry, focusing on current funding trends, potential benefits, and the challenges faced. Discover how venture capital, corporate, and government investments are driving innovation in PropTech, tokenization, and smart contracts.
keywords: blockchain, real estate, PropTech, funding, tokenization, smart contracts, venture capital, transparency, security, efficiency, land registry, smart city initiatives
title: Funding for Blockchain in Real Estate: Transforming the Industry
